text: Roberto Carballés Baena was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Federico Gaio won the title after defeating Paolo Lorenzi 6–3, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Internazionali di Tennis di Manerbio – Trofeo Dimmidisì - Singles 2019 Singles
title: 2019 Internazionali di Tennis di Manerbio – Trofeo Dimmidisì – Singles
